title: ils属性插件摔落百分比扣血怎么办
author: 向井户爱花
txt_content: ils摔落和被火烧都是百分比扣血，能解决吗

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
notepad打开ils的config配置
搜索以下内容:
environmentalDamage:
  block_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  cactus:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  drowning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fall:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire_tick:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  lava:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  lightning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  magic:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  poison:
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 0
  starvation:
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  damage:
    durabilityLost: 1
把damage调成1就可以了
如有帮助望采纳
改下文件里的属性就好
